d:I[22016,["/_next/static/chunks/3254475d9f795eed.js"],""]
e:Tba3,<br/># OpenClaw Skills Marketplace: How to Build and Sell AI Superpowers<br/><br/>One of OpenClaw's most powerful features is its **skills marketplace**. Just like the iPhone App Store revolutionized mobile computing, OpenClaw skills are creating an economy around AI capabilities.<br/><br/>## What Are OpenClaw Skills?<br/><br/>A "skill" is a package of instructions and tools that extend what your AI agent can do. Examples:<br/><br/>- **Weather skill** — Check forecasts for any location<br/>- **Twitter skill** — Post tweets, read mentions, analyze trends<br/>- **Email skill** — Manage inbox, send automated replies<br/>- **Custom skills** — Build anything you can imagine<br/><br/>## How to Build a Skill<br/><br/>Building an OpenClaw skill is surprisingly simple. Here's the basic structure:<br/><br/>```<br/>my-skill/<br/>├── SKILL.md          # Documentation<br/>├── skill.json        # Metadata (name, version, author)<br/>├── scripts/          # Executable scripts<br/>└── README.md         # User-facing description<br/>```<br/><br/>The `SKILL.md` file tells OpenClaw how to use your skill. Example:<br/><br/>```markdown<br/># Weather Skill<br/><br/>Fetches current weather and forecasts using wttr.in.<br/><br/>## Usage<br/>- "What's the weather in Tokyo?"<br/>- "Will it rain tomorrow in London?"<br/><br/>## Implementation<br/>Run: `curl wttr.in/[location]?format=j1`<br/>```<br/><br/>## Publishing to the Marketplace<br/><br/>Once your skill is ready:<br/><br/>1. **Test locally** — Make sure it works on your OpenClaw instance<br/>2. **Publish to ClawHub** — Use the `clawhub publish` CLI command<br/>3. **Set pricing** — Free, one-time purchase, or subscription<br/>4. **Promote** — Share on Twitter, Discord, and forums<br/><br/>## Monetization Strategies<br/><br/>Here's how skill creators are making money:<br/><br/>- **Freemium** — Basic features free, advanced features paid<br/>- **Niche solutions** — High-value skills for specific industries (real estate, finance, etc.)<br/>- **Bundles** — Package multiple skills together at a discount<br/>- **Subscription** — Monthly access for constantly updated skills<br/><br/>## Real Examples<br/><br/>Some successful skills on ClawHub:<br/><br/>- **Email Ninja** ($9.99/month) — Advanced inbox management with custom rules<br/>- **Social Amplifier** ($29.99 one-time) — Cross-post content to 10+ platforms<br/>- **Meeting Assistant** ($4.99/month) — Join Zoom calls, take notes, summarize<br/><br/>## Get Started Today<br/><br/>The skills marketplace is still early. If you can code (or prompt AI to code for you), you can build valuable tools and get paid for them.<br/><br/>The gold rush is happening right now. Are you building?<br/><br/>**Resources:**<br/>- [ClawHub Documentation](https://clawhub.com/docs)<br/>- [Skill Template Repository](https://github.com/openclaw/skill-template)<br/>- [OpenClaw Discord](https://discord.com/invite/clawd)<br/>    4:[["$","header",null,{"className":"border-b border-slate-200 bg-white","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4 py-6","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center justify-between","children":[["$","$Ld",null,{"href":"/","className":"flex items-center space-x-2","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-slate-900","children":["OpenClaw ",["$","span",null,{"className":"text-blue-600","children":"News"}]]}]}],["$","nav",null,{"className":"hidden md:flex items-center space-x-8 text-sm","children":[["$","$Ld",null,{"href":"/","className":"text-slate-700 hover:text-slate-900","children":"Home"}],["$","$Ld",null,{"href":"/about","className":"text-slate-700 hover:text-slate-900","children":"About"}],["$","$Ld",null,{"href":"/tutorials","className":"text-slate-700 hover:text-slate-900","children":"Tutorials"}]]}]]}]}]}],["$","article",null,{"className":"max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-12","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"mb-12","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center gap-3 mb-4","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 text-sm font-medium rounded-full","children":"Tutorial"}],["$","time",null,{"className":"text-slate-600 text-sm","children":"February 24, 2026"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-slate-600 text-sm","children":"·"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-slate-600 text-sm","children":"7 min read"}]]}],["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-slate-900 mb-6","children":"OpenClaw Skills Marketplace: How to Build and Sell AI Superpowers"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-xl text-slate-600","children":"The OpenClaw skills marketplace is the App Store for AI agents. Here's how to build, publish, and monetize your own skills."}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose prose-lg max-w-none","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$e"}}],"$Lf"]}]]
